PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and LUMO levels were -5.24 and -2.99 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO level |
| LUMO level |
| Energy level (for HOMO and LUMO) |

Explanation:
HOMO and LUMO are abbreviations for the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital and the Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital, respectively. These are energy levels in a molecular orbital description of a molecule.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| LUMO energy level |

Explanation:
HOMO and LUMO are material properties that refer to the energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital, respectively.
